name: Thousand-Faced Skott
description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

skills.name: Wolf's Resilience
skills.description: In this battle, "Thousand-Faced Skott" shares HP with all other "Skott" units.

skills.name: Wolf's Temptation
skills.description: Adds "Roar of the Lone Wolf" on the Action Order. Every time "Roar of the Lone Wolf" takes action, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states on all "Skott" units on the field, switches all "Mocked" states on all "Skott" units on the field to "Rabid" states, and uses "To the Lone Wolf: Ignoble Life." Every time a "Skott" is Weakness Broken, the action of "Roar of the Lone Wolf" is slightly delayed.

skills.name: To the Lone Wolf: Ignoble Life
skills.description: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."
